cmp: 可 (can/may/able to/certain(ly)/to suit/(particle used for emphasis))

exm.mng: bumpy (of a road), rough (of life), to be down on one's luck, to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
variant of 坎坷[kǎn kě], bumpy (of a road), rough (of life)
pot-holed and bumpy road (idiom); fig. full of disappointment and dashed hopes
to have a tough life, to meet much adversity in one's life
full of trouble and misfortune (usu. referring to someone's life)
